org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.polyfit
Class TSPolynomialFitter

java.lang.Object
  org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.TSBase
      org.aavso.tools.vstar.util.polyfit.TSPolynomialFitter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAlgorithm, IPolynomialFitter
public class TSPolynomialFitter
extends TSBase
implements IPolynomialFitter

This is a Java translation of the Fortran polymast subroutine from the AAVSO's ts1201.f by Matthew Templeton, which in turn was based upon BASIC code by Grant Foster.

As Matt has said, this is a standard polynomial fit of the form:

f(x) = sum(ax^n)
